data: It is something of an experience for an Englishman, after thirty years' absence, to stand on the steps of “Morley’s” and face the sunlight of Trafalgar Square.
It is something of an experience for an Englishman, after thirty years' absence, to stand on the steps of "Morley's" and face the sunlight of Trafalgar Square.
Lindsey, William, 1858-1922; Gilbert, W. B., active 1902 [Illustrator]
